title: Home Fit
description: This is a look at the final  project for 201 Code Fellows. I collaborated with Matt Favoino, Robert Bronson and Brian Wheeler. The concept was to make an easy to use workout generator that can give you a good short workout for your specific needs.

title: About Me
description: This is my first ever project in 201 Code Fellows. I made a short and simple about me page that quizes you and gives you some information about me.

title: Salmon Cookies
description: A project to make a form that gives randomized sales numbers and adds them to give daily and hourly totals.
